protein.specific_function: Involved in cell-matrix and cell-cell adhesion interactions that are required for normal development. May participate in the linkage between muscle fiber and basement membrane. May play a role in endochondral ossification of bone and branching morphogenesis of lung. Binds heparin

reference.reference_text: Snellman A, Tu H, Vaisanen T, Kvist AP, Huhtala P, Pihlajaniemi T: A short sequence in the N-terminal region is required for the trimerization of type XIII collagen and is conserved in other collagenous transmembrane proteins. EMBO J. 2000 Oct 2;19(19):5051-9.
